name: Probation Officer and New Narcotics K-9 Keep Youth Facilities Safe
description: Probation Officer Claudia Romero is working with a relatively new K-9 partner named Lilly that is trained to sniff out narcotics. Together, they are working to keep youth safe by checking for illegal drugs in juvenile facilities like the Youth Transition Campus and East Mesa Juvenile Detention Facility.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office
